book.name: Folders - How to Guide
book.intro:
Folders

Folders are used for organizing material. Folders will generally hold documents. Many of these are used for Teacher resources.

chapter.title: Folders
chapter.content:
Folders

Folders can be used within Moodle to provide a way to organize material. Folders respond just like on any other computer system.

chapter.title: ATEP Use
chapter.content:
ATEP Use

Generally, folders within ATEP are used to provide additional Teacher notes and resources. The Feasibility Teacher should be very familiar with these. These will also be hidden from the students. 

In the example below, note the Title "Teacher Notes and Resources" is grey and the eye is closed. This indicates that this item is hidden from student view. 

*Please be cautious NOT to click on the eye to open this to students.
